spaServices.treatment: Dog or Cat Full Spa Treatment
spaServices.bath:
Bath, massage, full grooming of hair and nails
(comes with a take home bath kit and animal treats).
spaServices.massagingOfThePaws:
Massaging of the paws, thighs, head and of course, behind the ears
(comes with animal treats).
spaServices.facialAndFurCleanseTreatment: Doggy Facial and Fur Cleanse Treatment
spaServices.dogsReceive:
Dogs receive a facial with our vegan, cruelty free face products and cleansing
 of any dirt left hiding in their beautiful fur
 (comes with a take home face products and animal treats).
spaServices.catFacialAndFurCleanseTreatment: Cat Facial and Fur Cleanse Treatment
spaServices.catReceivesAFacial:
Cat receives a facial with our vegan, cruelty free face products and cleansing
 of any dirt left hidding in their fur (comes with a take home face products
 and animal treats).
spaServices.catAndDogSwimSpaRetreat: Cat and Dog Swim Spa Retreat
spaServices.takeYourAnimal:
Take your animal on an amazing journey retreat in the woods with a scratch
 proof tent, feline repellant protector and sticks galore (for dogs, of course).
 There is a sauna that is for the animal owners and a smaller bath for your
 pets (comes with a cute animal raincoat and boots).

blog.whereToRead: Where To Read All About The Bark!
blog.rexTheDog: Rex, The Dog Who Never Stops Playing ... Ever
blog.sometimesIt:
Sometimes it is difficult to get dogs 

interested in the toys you buy for them. .. 

Luckily for Rex, everything he sees is a 

potential toy for him! Never let him around 

your valuables or any socks. He will steal 

them and you will never see them again...
blog.oneDay:
One day, we started noticing Rex was ripping

apart all of our sheets when he was bored 

except for this blanket over here. Rex decided

to spare this ugly white blanket that my 

grandmother gave me from her war days. We

never threw it away because we felt bad. 

Seeing Rex sleep on this blanket made us 

happy. At least someone was using this 

blanket, even if we had to rebuy brand new

sheets because we have such an amazing dog.



We love you Rex.

aboutUs.ourOwners: Our Owners Love Dogs and Cats Only
aboutUs.hereAtLuxe:
Here at Luxe Animal Spa we aim to provide you
 with the best service possible for both you and
 your pet! We pride ourselves in offering a true
 first-class experience.

Our grooming equipment is top quality.  We use
only the most trusted brands in the industry
which provides a beautiful, calming, and safe
salon experience for your pets.
aboutUs.allAnimals:
All animals deserve a special spa pampering
treatment, but mostly cats and dogs. Luxe Animal
Spa offers the best spa treatments to leave your
pets feeling amazing!

We are the first in Canada to offer spa treatments
for cats and dogs. This is unheard of in many
places so come, bring your amazing cat or dog and
let us make their spa experience something they
will never forget!
